name: Greater Aspect of Sorrow
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Aura of Silence
traits.desc: Living creatures within 30 feet of the aspect are under the effects of the silence spell. This effect ends when the aspect is reduced to 0 hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The aspect is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The aspect has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The aspect's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aspect makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Wave of Dread (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each hostile creature within 30 feet of the aspect must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for one minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
